headline: West Virginia court declines to answer whether opioids distribution can cause public nuisance
summary: CHARLESTON, W.Va. — West Virginia's Supreme Court on Monday declined to answer a federal court's question in an appeal in a landmark lawsuit over whether the distribution of opioids can cause a...
